title: Costco’s bold gamble suing Trump for tariff refunds
description: In a striking departure from corporate America’s cautious stance, Costco has launched a legal offensive against the Trump administration, filing suit on Friday over tariffs that have extracted nearly $90 billion from U.S. importers. The wholesale retailer’s l…
